Description:
Araragi Matriarch is the mother of Koyomi Araragi, Karen Araragi, and Tsukihi Araragi.
She and her husband work as police officers, causing them to have very busy work schedules and commonly be away from home.

#Tsubasa_Tiger.text: She and Koyomi's father give permission off-screen for Tsubasa Hanekawa to spend time at their place for shelter.

#Sodachi_Riddle.text: It is revealed that she gave shelter to Sodachi Oikura when she and Koyomi were in grade school.
